markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hulking Size](/Feats.aspx?ID=2919) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your eidolon grows substantially. Your eidolon becomes Large, instead of its previous size, and its [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=192) increases to 10 feet. This doesn't change any of its other statistics.

<title level="2">Hulking Size leads to...</title>
[Towering Size](/Feats.aspx?ID=2932)
name: Hulking Size
